parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the instrument cluster display can lead to a hazardous situation, as the driver may not be able to read important error messages, service lights, and other critical information, potentially causing accidents or other safety issues.
symptoms: The instrument cluster display is dim
has lines running through the screen
displays missing and faded pixels
incomplete information
or does not work at all. Occasionally
there is an odor similar to electrical smoke.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ECM can cause the vehicle to lose power during acceleration, leading to accidents or other safety issues.
symptoms: The check engine light comes on
and the vehicle loses power during acceleration.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the driver's seat frame can cause the seat to rock forward and backward during acceleration and deceleration, potentially leading to accidents or other safety issues.
symptoms: The driver's seat experiences a rocking motion during acceleration and deceleration.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Brake Booster/Vacuum Assist Line Check Valve Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake booster/vacuum assist line check valve can cause a total loss of power-assisted braking, making it difficult to stop the vehicle, which can lead to accidents.
symptoms: Sudden loss of brakes
feeling of pushing a brick through the floor to stop the vehicle
no warning before the loss of brakes.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Warped Front Rotors and Worn Brake Pads
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Warped front rotors and worn brake pads can cause vibration or pulsation when braking, which can lead to reduced braking performance and increased stopping distances.
symptoms: Vibration or pulsation when stopping
warped front rotors
worn or chunked brake pads.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Excessive Radial Axial Run-out of Brake Rotors
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Excessive radial axial run-out of brake rotors can cause vibration or pulsation when braking, which can lead to reduced braking performance and increased stopping distances.
symptoms: Vibration or pulsation when stopping
excessive radial axial run-out of brake rotors.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The rocking motion of the driver's seat can cause discomfort, distraction, and loss of control while driving, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The driver's seat experiences a rocking motion when the vehicle accelerates
the seat feels unstable or wobbly
the seat shifts or moves excessively during acceleration.
